00054 class ListView : public QListView, public ThreadedLuaObject {

00061   ListView(lubyk::Worker *worker)  {
00062     setAttribute(Qt::WA_DeleteOnClose);
00063     setSelectionMode(QAbstractItemView::SingleSelection);
00064     // Not editable
00065     setEditTriggers(QAbstractItemView::NoEditTriggers);

00067     // FIXME: find another way to remove the dotted lines around text after click.
00068     clearFocus();
00069     MIMAS_DEBUG_CC
00070   }

00203   LuaStackSize globalPosition(lua_State *L) {
00204     QPoint pt = mapToGlobal(QPoint(0, 0));
00205     lua_pushnumber(L, pt.x());
00206     lua_pushnumber(L, pt.y());
00207     return 2;
00208   }

00234   LuaStackSize indexAt(float x, float y, lua_State *L) {
00235     // indexAt calls "data" method in data_source_ (don't ask why...)
00236     QModelIndex idx = QListView::indexAt(QPoint(x, y));
00237     if (idx.isValid()) {
00238       lua_pushnumber(L, idx.row() + 1);
00239       lua_pushnumber(L, idx.column() + 1);
00240       return 2;
00241     } else {
00242       return 0;
00243     }
00244   }
00245 
00246   void selectRow(int row) {
00247     QModelIndex index = model()->index(row - 1, 0);
00248     if ( index.isValid() )
00249         selectionModel()->select( index, QItemSelectionModel::ClearAndSelect );
00250   }
00251 
00254   void setModel(DataSource *model) {
00255     QListView::setModel(model);
00256   }
00257 
00258   int luaInit(lua_State *L, ListView *obj, const char *class_name) {
00259     ThreadedLuaObject::luaInit(L, obj, class_name);
00260     // <self>
00261     lua_pushlstring(L, "data_source", 11);
00262     // <self> <'data_source'>
00263     // <self>
00264     DataSource *data = new DataSource();
00265     data->luaInit(L, data, "mimas.DataSource");
00266     // <self> <'data_source'> <data>
00267     lua_settable(L, -3); // self.data_source = data
00268     // <self>
00269     // make DataSource look in <self> for callbacks
00270     lua_pushvalue(L, -1);
00271     // <self> <self>
00272     lua_pop(data->lua_, 1);
00273     lua_xmove(L, data->lua_, 1);
00274     // data: <self>
00275     // <self>
00276     setModel(data);
00277     return 1;
00278   }
00279 
00280 protected:
00281   virtual void mouseMoveEvent(QMouseEvent *event);
00282 
00283   virtual void mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent *event) {
00284     if (!click(event, MousePress))
00285       QListView::mousePressEvent(event);
00286   }
00287 
00288   virtual void mouseDoubleClickEvent(QMouseEvent *event) {
00289     if (!click(event, DoubleClick))
00290       QListView::mouseDoubleClickEvent(event);
00291   }
00292 
00293   virtual void mouseReleaseEvent(QMouseEvent *event) {
00294     if (!click(event, MouseRelease))
00295       QListView::mouseReleaseEvent(event);
00296   }
00297 
00298   virtual QSize sizeHint() const {
00299     return size_hint_;
00300   }
